author: Crossedfall (Crossedfall#1001)
install_msg: While functional, this cog is currently still in development. Please report issues here: https://github.com/crossedfall/crossed-cogs/issues.
name: PlusRep+
short: Give updoots to your favorite memes
description: Reacts to messages in a designated channel that allows users to show if they liked it or not. Votes are tallied and added to a leaderboard
